item.title: [InsidiaX] Preload models
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

when i add a server in the raw folder and when i let it load i get this error when i start client

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\WeLive4Op Cache\Data\models.idx (Het systeem k an het opgegeven bestand niet vinden) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at ModelDecompressor.models(ModelDecompressor.java:43) at client.startUp(client.java:9096) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6072) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

this is the coding

public void preloadModels() { File file = new File(signlink.findcachedir()+"Raw/"); File[] fileArray = file.listFiles(); for(int y = 0; y < fileArray.length; y++) { String s = fileArray[y].getName(); byte[] buffer = ReadFile(signlink.findcachedir()+"Raw/"+s); Model.method460(buffer,Integer.parseInt(getFileNameWithoutExtension(s))); } }
and preloadmodels is loaded

/* All 525 Models */ ModelDecompressor.hdgfx(); System.out.println("Loaded 525 graphics..."); /* 525 End */ ModelDecompressor.models(); System.out.println("Loaded Compressed Models.."); drawLoadingText(70, "Loading Models.."); ModelDecompressor.loadModelDataFile(); drawLoadingText(80, "Unpacking Models.."); preloadModels(); DataBase.loadAnimations();

Read full topic
